title: The Fugitive S01E13 Terror at High Point DVDRip DivX
description:
The Fugitive Season 1 (1963)
S01E13 Terror at High Point
First aired: 12/17/1963 

While working at a construction site in Utah, Kimble convinces his supervisor, Buck Harmon, to hire Jamie, a mentally retarded but physically strong young man to help out. Because Jamie is an easy target for the taunts of the other work crew members, Kimble becomes Jamie&#039;s protector. When Jamie is accused of sexually assaulting Buck&#039;s wife, he becomes frightened and runs away. The crew foreman, Dan Pike, convinces Buck to organize a posse to hunt down Jamie and kill him. Jack Klugman, Billy Halop guest star.

Cast: David Janssen as Dr. Richard Kimble, Barry Morse as Lt. Philip Gerard, Bill Raisch as Fred Johnson (The One-Armed Man), Diane Brewster (flashbacks) as Helen Kimble, J.D.Cannon as Lloyd Chandler, William Conrad as Narrator (voice)

Guest cast: Jack Klugman (Buck), Elizabeth Allen (Ruth), James Best (Dan), Buck Taylor (Jamie), Richard Webb (Kripps), Russ Vincent (Rufe), Richard Wessell (Charley), Doreen McLean (Mrs. Hendricks), Billy Halop (Mike)
Writer: Peter Germano, Harry Kronman
Director: Jerry Hopper
